item.description:
Coach Kevin better known as SupahFans, celebrates the Grand Opening of his new SupahFans Streetwear shop on Saturday, April 3 from 10 am to 7 pm and beyond at another location.

The store is located at 470 Commonwealth Avenue in Kenmore Square.

Coach Kevin has set the days Itinerary:

Brunch at his neighbors The Lower Depths - chill neighborhood bar

SupahFan Shirts & Sports Memorabilia Raffles

Celebrity Guests

Red Sox Native Governor Jared Carrabis autographing books

Former Red Sox General Manager Dan Duquette chats Baseball

Boston Fire Ladder 15 & Engine 33 ($10.00 Fenway Fire Shirt is donated to Burn Foundation

Kid's Easter Egg Hunt for Red Sox Nation wrist bands

Celtic bagpiper

$1.00 charitable raffle with prizes including Opening Day Tickets, announced at 8pm

New England Revolution Girls

Narraganset Beer Girls

Townie News.com's Paul Fitzgerald from NESN's">NESN's "Pocket Money" street game show

Sales

Discounts for Red Sox Natives

Dirty Water TV (NESN) After Party at the Baseball Tavern 6 pm - midnight

More information at or E Mail Kevin on the Red Sox Natives site.

More details to follow from Kevin!
item.name: SupahFans Grand Opening Party
